summary: The code utilizes ffplay to sequentially play FLV files with a 3-second delay between each, then exits.

details.comment: This code uses ffplay to sequentially play videos from "output/0.flv" to "output/31.flv" with a 3-second delay between each video, then exits.
details.content:
ffplay -i output/0.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/10.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/11.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/12.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/13.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/14.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/15.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/16.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/17.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/19.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/1.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/20.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/21.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/22.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/23.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/24.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/25.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/26.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/27.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/28.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/29.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/2.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/30.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/31.flv -autoexit; sleep 3

details.comment: This code plays and auto-exits various FLV files in order, with pauses between each playback.
details.content:
ffplay -i output/35.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/38.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
ffplay -i output/39.flv -autoexit; sleep 3
